1.content:
Welcome to the interactive.

This is where it branches into the many other tales.
1.title: Welcome

11.content:
Name: Ryan Akechi

Gender: Male

Age: 19

Race:Weapon Meister

Facial Features: Dark tan skin, slightly broad nose, his incisors are as sharp as fangs

Physical Features: Thin, tall, and agile

Appearance: Closed black trenchcoat with black sweats under, white skin tight gloves, and a grey scarf with white skull and crossbones strewn across it.

Weapon Name: Alastor

Weapon Mode: Pure white halberd

Weapon Features: Same height as Ryan, skinny, pale, dressed in the same clothes as Ryan but it's completly white.
11.title: Introducing Ryan Akechi and Alastor

111.content:
With Alastor walking by his side, Ryan and Alastor casually walked the streets of Death city. The day was slow and the sun was beginning to set. Not one evil soul was seen and the wait has begun to take its' effect on the duo.
"I'm tired of all this waiting man" Alastor finally said. "I want something to kill." The duo turned down a dimly lit alleyway. "Patience my friend" Ryan said at almost a whisper. "There's something nearby, I can feel it"
They came to a small clearing. It was almost perfectly circle and there was trash littered around the edges. At the center was a large figure that seemed bent over something out of view. Ryan turned to Alastor giving him a look of accomplishment. Alastor in turn closed his eyes and tilted his head back. Light began to emanate from his body as his form began to change into his weapon form. His head turning into the blade and his body becoming the shaft. Soon he had changed into a halberd and Ryan grabbed him, bearing his teeth in anticipation.
111.title: Slow Days

1111.content:
Ryan held Alastor pointed at the figure. "Ready?" Ryan asked. "For hours now" Alastor responded. Ryan charged the figure, leaning low with Alastor at his side. With both hands on the handle, he leaped high into the air, Alastor over his head. With a battle cry, he brought the weapon down on the figures head.
         The sound of the clatter was deafening.


(Unfinished)
1111.title: Surprise

12.content:
Name-Azuki Rhaine

age-17

Features- Skin pale white,Black hair that comes in a ragged line about at his eye level, but his eyes can still be seen, sharp green eyes, slender, long fingers and over all, kind of creepy.
Usually wears black pants, and a black jacket with designs on it over a gray shirt.

Race-weapon meiser

Weapon name-Kit Stern

Features-about the oppisite of Azuki in all but size and build, has light brown hair, that parts, goldish eyes, and an all around friendly face. White, with a light brown tint to it.
Doesn't really have a set outfit, just puts whatever on.

Weapon form- bracer blades (kind of like blood rhines, you know, the ones that you put on your arm like a gauntlet, but instead it doesn't extend to the hand, but has a wide blade attached to it)
12.title: Azukii and Kit

121.content:
Azukii looked around his classroom, it was packed. People of every veriety were joined together for the sole purpose of learning a few things about whatever they were learning about for the day. All exept for the ones that were slacking off and not paying attention, his partner Kit for example.

Kit was a care-free spirit, one that focused on having fun and one who didn't like being confined in a boring class for hours on end.
"Kit, how are you going to learn anything at all when you never listen to the teacher, or even attempt to do your work," Azukii hissed sharply.
"Why should I, when your pulling enough weight for both of us put together," asked Kit, putting his feet on the table and leaning back, not caring as usual.
"That's the problem, don't you want to learn anything?" asked Azukii sharply.
"Nope," says Kit, now intentally annoying him.
Why don't you do something," asked Azukii, taking the bait.
"Like what?"
"I don't know LEARN SOMETHING!" you shouted the last part.
"Mr. Rhaine, do you wish to share something with the class?" asked the teacher, clearly annoyed.
"No sir," Azukii says coldly.
"Then lets get back to our previous discussion please,"
Azukii just put his head on the desk, fuming.

"See what happens when your a stick in the mud Zuke," snickers Kit.
"Don't call me that,"
"why not?"
"Because it's annoying!"
"Mr. Rhain!," interupts the teacher, "I would like you to recite what we just discussed.
Azukii sighs, "a sound mind comes from a..."
Kit snickers.
121.title: Personality issues

13.content:
Name: Chaz Nyudo

Gender: Male

Age: 15

Race: Meister

Facial Features: Sports a slight tan, average sized nose, has 'bed eyes', meaning his eyes make him look as though he's sleepy. Usually looks bored or lazy.

Physical Features: Lanky, rather flexible because of this, and appears to be quite lithe to boot.

Appearance: Large purple jersey with a white t-shirt underneath. Baggy cargo pants that are a shade of dark green color. Wears a black beanie that appears to be rather large for his head and falls over slightly to the right, so much so that it conceals his right eye (he doesn't seem to mind this however and has even stated he prefers looking out of his left eye anyway). wears a chain around his neck that holds a padlock.

Weapon Name: Momiji Aosora

Weapon Mode: Gauntlets, although both are attached to each other by a chain. This would explain how , is a two handed weapon.

Weapon Features: A bit taller than Chaz. Short, wavy sky blue hair, and deep blue eyes. Where's a blue hooded blouse with white sleeves and a long dark blue dress, adorned with cloud like designs along the bottom. Has an overall gentle face...unlike her Meister...
13.title: Chaz n' Momiji

14.content: Who Are you? You are taking a witch for the 100th soul.
14.title: Who are you?

15.content: Here's some more just incase
15.title: More

151.content:
Name: Comen Tora

Gender: Male

Age: 13

Race: A human sized mouse, dog mixed breed (Weapon and Meister)

Facial Features: He has fur all around his body, with a brown circle of fur on his back. A three foot long tail, a collar with a special green gem on the front, has a nose that sticks out 3 inches in front of him, ears that stick up like some type of dogs.

Physical Features: half the size of an average teen, doesn't really eat much, meisters himself, and is very fast (he believes speed and technique are the way too fight, not strength).
151.title: Comen Tora

1511.content:
Huh? What just happened? I thought to myself, Where am I? I don't remember anything that just happened.
"Hey! Kishin! Your soul is mine!!!" a girl yelled out in the distance.
"Who's there?" the girl came in sight which made it alot easier to see, "What do you mean by kishin?" Too late, she already started running. From the looks of it, she looks like she wants to hurt me, no, kill me. She swung her scythe at me and just barely missed, "Hey, what was that for!?! What a way to welcome a guest." "Huh, a kishin with a sense of humor." she said rudely in reply. "What the hell is a kishin! I don't understand why you think I'm a kishin!" She scoffed and looked at me with a disappointed face, "Like you wouldn't know. A kishin is a person who turned from humanity, and eats human souls." I yelled right back, "What do you mean? Sure, I might be dead right now but I have not eaten a single human soul! I didn't even know you could eat souls in this dimension!" She jumped and struck me on my tricept. "Aaagghh! That Hurt! Why don't you understand that I'm not a kishin! I'll give you a choice, kill me and become a kishin, or let me go and understand!" She stopped and looked at me, "You may be right, but I won't let you go just yet." She rushed toward me and bonked me in the head knocking me out, "Who said I was going to kill you?" With that, I fainted.
1511.title: The False Fight

152.content:
Name: Vincent Collins (paradox or parody to friends)

Gender: Male

age: 14

race: twilight child and temporary meister

facial features: has average nose and large mismatched anime style eyes (red on right blue on left). has lengthy ears (about 8 inches) with normal width that can move around with emotions. has sharp, K9 like teeth. has young appearance but can have very scornful/threatening and insane eyes when needed, but they're usually a mixture of calm and bored.

physical features: rather short, white and seems incapable of tanning(many have tried) thin and agile due to the retractable electric roller blades he wears at all times. well proportioned other than the obscenely tall and numerous lightning rod like hair on his head and usually is wearing a cynic's T-shirt, a hoody, and dark jeans.

weapon(s): Tom and Elizabeth

tom: age 14

has short brown hair, brown eyes, and decent build, significantly taller that Vincent and has a simpler way of thinking which is reflected in his weapon form.

weapon form: combat knife with whittled base to fit with handguns.

Elizabeth: age 14

slightly shorter than Tom but still taller than Vincent. has long curly blonde hair and blue eyes, and has a rivalry with Vincent grade wise. always likes to plan things out and is more complicated than her partners.

weapon form: large hand gun with optional silencing at price of power.
152.title: paradox

1521.content: The rift seemed perfect, like even a new dimension wouldn't have too much turbulence, but I was wrong and got knocked unconscious because of it. My name is paradox, but I don the name Vincent for dealing with my old race, humans. I was kind of a nerd before but that actually comes in handy since most anime and cartoons were actually just recorded information from other universes and dimensions. This time I woke up to a familiar freak show moon that seemed to be grinning and drooling blood, but i couldn't remember the name of the show. I knew that i was in some swamp and I could hear someone being chased in my direction, so i stood up and checked to see if any of my weapons made it with me. What i discovered was weird as hell, my weapons had disappeared completely but my syringes made it untouched, my inter dimensional communications equipment was fried but it looked like it would still work in my current universe. Deep in thought and camouflaged in the darkness Neither I nor my new acquaintance noticed each other until he toppled both of us over, and began muttering, "Just one more." before grabbing my throat. My left arm shined pure white and I hit him in the chest open palmed causing a dark being to fly out and into a tree. The man on top of me quickly removed himself and said "thanks, but what the hell did you do?" my only response was to point at the being and get into a fighting stance, ready to rip it apart with my claw like nails, but the man insisted on helping and did something even i found freakish, he turned into a lengthy combat knife with a filed base, almost like it was made for me. I instinctively caught it but before i could end the shadow it was sliced in half by a black and red scythe held by young blonde girl. "What happened here? And who are you?" was all she said to me and the man who was now standing next to me looking like he was ready to run off. For now i didn't say any thing but stayed facing her while I slammed the man back and open a wide rift while falling back myself, but before I fell through i gave a slight smile and gave the girl and her odd partner the finger before disappearing into the darkness.
1521.title: let's get this over with.

153.content:
Name: the Phantom

Species Kishin

This elusive Kishin is responsible for the deaths of an entire village and the murders of every meister and weapons sent after it, all encounter details a change in appearance in both gender and looks but always having the same razor sword claws and long tentacle appendages on it's back.

last seen in death city.

approach with extreme caution

Kishin possesses the ability to leave it's current body in soul form and enter another host where it will overwhelm the hosts soul and consume all the while possessing the body
153.title: New Storyline

info.brief_description: How would your life go if you were in Soul Eater
info.description:
As said in the brief description, this is an interactive about Soul Eater where you pick the main character. These are the rules:

1) You must provide a full description including: Name,Race.Facial Features,Physical Features,Appearance,Weapon/Meister name,Weapon/Meister facial/physical features

2)Swearing is allowed. Just dont over do it

3)If your going to add to another person's storyline(which includes my own) please ask first
